title: Video: Nomadic Firs – Vines
content:
Wow.

I’m not quite sure how this track passed me by. Made available earlier in the year via the Nomadic Firs soundcloud, Vines is the most gloriously addictive three and a half minutes of psychedelic pop you’ll hear this year. Alongside the release of a video to accompany Vines, Nomadic Firs have also announced that their debut LP will be available via our long-time bros at Crash Symbols, which I’m sure you’ll agree is a match made in heaven. Be sure to check out the clip, which features plenty of chickens, cats and most importantly, more care free fun than you can shake a stick at. So, without further delay, press play below, and allow your feet to do the talking, I pity anyone who doesn’t find themselves driven to dance round their room like a crazed lunatic.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
